examples.text: İstanbul, 21 (Özel) - […] Kral Karol'un beraber yaşadığı Madam Lüpesko ile diğer hükûmet ricalini öldurmeği kararlaştıran Faşist talebe ile reisleri, toplandıkları yerde yakalanmışlar ve tertib ettikleri kara liste bu suretle zabıtanın eline geçmiştir.[…]
examples.translation: The Fascist student and his leaders, who had decided to kill Madame Lupescu, with whom King Carol lived, as well as other government officials, were caught at the location where they had gathered and the blacklist they had compiled was seized by the police.
